alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:55PM CDT until March 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EASTERN POWESHIEK AND NORTHEASTERN MAHASKA COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Montezuma, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Deep River around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Brooklyn, Guernsey, Victor, Victor and Hartwick. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 187 and 204. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
